title: Dine: Chef of modern Israeli cuisine coming home to Pittsburgh to celebrate his first cookbook
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Dining - Today 
On Nov. 2, Mike Solomonov, a former Pittsburgher and now a Philadelphia restaurateur, will take over the kitchen at Cure in Lawrenceville as...
